item.itunes:title: Dawn Dancing in Munich: The Magic of Kocherlball
item.description:
Journey into the heart of Munich's English Garden, where centuries-old traditions blend seamlessly with modern urban life in this captivating episode of Croissants and Castles. From the iconic Chinese Tower rising 75 feet into the Bavarian sky to the unexpected sight of surfers riding a standing wave on the Eisbach creek, this verdant paradise proves larger than New York's Central Park and equally rich in cultural significance. From the iconic Le Petit Cler café near the Eiffel Tower to the serene Luxembourg Gardens, discover how ordinary Parisians demonstrated extraordinary courage during the Nazi occupation.
